column2: Sometimes I look at myself in the ripples of the water, or comments are made by my friends or rivals about my strength. Sometimes I feel as if their comments ring true...
Others have been making comments about my ward and their strength...
They say they are strong for their age.
They say they are unusually athletic.
They claim they are a little weak...
They say they are average for their age.

A player has asked to swear fealty, but is a King themselves. If you wish to take them as a vassal, you must have an Empire-tier title. To deal with this, accepting will create an Empire Tier title based on your primary title and automatically vassalise them.
This union would be in my interest.
I accept your humble request to become a Knight, go forth and serve the Seven Pointed star with honor and virtue.
I offer my services to the most holy Seven.
No, you do not deserve a Knighthood.
This decision gives a King the ability to form an Empire-tier title, so you may swear fealty to them.
Consolidation of the realm destroys all held petty Kingdoms, including those held by vassals, and unites the Kingdom.
Take upon the Crown of Dragonstone, and announce to the world the new Kingdom!
Name the target character as being one of your pages. It is a trait that will expire upon reaching the age of sixteen.
Name the target character as being one of your squires. It will last for the rest of their life or until they are Knighted.
